long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RelaxingNewTab: New Tab Experience for Peace of Mind seekers Chrome Tab

Upgrade your browsing experience with RelaxingNewTab – Clutter-free start-point, featuring calming background images, quick access to relevant links, and the power search engine provided by Microsoft Bing – all in one place.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Relaxing New Tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described in the Terms of Use (https://Relaxingnewtab.com/terms-of-use/) and Privacy Policy (https://Relaxingnewtab.com/privacy-policy/)

Features:
•	Calming Background Images: Every time you open a new tab, you’ll be greeted with a newly picked nature-themed background image.
•	Quick Links: Access a handpicked selection of relevant links to help you relax and focus.
•	Search bar Integration: Experience the convenience of search engine directly from your new tab. Search for everyday information, images, and more without interrupting your browsing flow.

Why Choose RelaxingNewTab:
- Enjoy yourself with new background image every time you open a new tab.
- Stay focused and relaxed with the latest music tracks.
- Enjoy the convenience of quick access to relevant related links.

Note: RelaxingNewTab respects your privacy. For details on data collection and usage, refer to our Privacy Policy.

Start your journey with RelaxingNewTab today and experience the road of automotive enthusiasm with every click!
